series_description: This series consists of information gathered during research for report writing. Includes but is not limited to undeveloped study issues, documents and duplicates of records contained in other research series, and background data that is collected, but then not used in the final report.
retention_statement: Retain 2 years after file is closed, then transfer to the Records Center, Library of Virginia. Retain in Records Center 2 years. Total retention 4 years then destroy.

series_description: This series consists of the historical records describing the work of the Commission. Documentation includes member lists, agency plans and annual legislative activity reports, meeting calendars, agendas and meeting materials, recommendations presented for action and revisions/results of those actions. Also included is documentation on Commission bills and resolutions.
retention_statement: Retain in agency for 10 years, then transfer to , Library of Virginia.

series_description: This series consists of informal, informational research conducted by Commission staff at the request of individual members of the General Assembly. Research relates to legislation under consideration or in various stages of the legislative process. Includes but is not limited to correspondence, reference material, agency documents and reports.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after file is closed, then transfer to the Records Center, Library of Virginia. Retain in Records Center 2 years. Total retention 5 years, then transfer to , Library of Virginia.
Retain 3 years after study is completed, then transfer to
